text: Lauren Tom (born August 4, 1961) is an American actress. Her roles include Lena St. Clair in The Joy Luck Club, Julie in the NBC sitcom Friends, Dot in the final season of Grace Under Fire, Numbuh 3 in Codename: Kids Next Door, and the voices on Futurama as Amy Wong. She also starred in King of the Hill as Minh and Connie Souphanousinphone, and in The Powerpuff Girls series voicing as numerous characters. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Highland Park, Illinois
title: Lauren Tom
